snippet: Bumble Bee Foods will pay $6 million to settle criminal charges filed after a worker burned to death in an industrial oven packed with canned tuna.
abstract: Bumble Bee Foods will pay $6 million to settle criminal charges in connection with 2012 death of worker who was fatally burned inside industrial oven packed with canned tuna.
lead_paragraph: Bumble Bee Foods will pay $6 million to settle criminal charges filed after a worker burned to death in an industrial oven packed with canned tuna.

headline.main: Bumble Bee Foods Will Pay $6 Million in Worker’s Death
headline.print_headline: Bumble Bee Foods Will Pay $6 Million in Worker’s Death
